```{r}

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggridges)

data("stop_words")

jasa_articles = read_csv("./data/jasa_articles_dataset_complete.csv",
                         col_types = "ccccccc") %>%
  clean_names() %>% 
  separate(authors, into = paste("author", 1:18, sep = "_"), sep = ", ") %>% 
  separate(author_1, into = c("author_1", "author_19"), sep = " & ") %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, title)

jasa_articles = anti_join(jasa_articles, stop_words)



```
